title: [Large-scale] Autoethnographic Approach for Culturally Relevant Educational Design for Indigenous Communities

context.prior_knowledge: Basic instructional design knowledge and general understanding of Indigenous cultures
context.additional_context: Focuses on strengthening educational design capabilities based on cultural sensitivity for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields.

learning_goals: Apply an instructional design framework incorporating cultural symbols of Indigenous communities (e.g., star quilts)
Critically analyze cultural contexts in instructional design processes through autoethnographic reflection
Establish interaction strategies among learners, educators, and communities using a relationship-centered design model
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
